means: 起安慰作用的人（或事物）

sentence.Network_en: He knew then he was right, but it was no consolation.
sentence.Network_cn: 当时他知道自己是正确的，但这并不能给他任何安慰。

sentence.Network_en: When her mother died, she found consolation in her religious beliefs.
sentence.Network_cn: 当她母亲去世时, 她在宗教信仰中找到了安慰.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... consistent 一致的 consolation 慰藉 console 安慰.
console的用法：安慰；抚慰；慰问 ... consolable adj. 可安慰的； consolation n. 慰籍 consolidate v. 统一；稳固；.
and if it is any consolation , I have heartburn that's radiating my kneecaps and I haven't a dump since Wednesday . morning !如果有任何安慰的话，我心痛，因为我自星期三早晨起还没有上过大号！

list.abs: 现当代中国艺术之国际知名设计师作品... ... MAGGIOLINA ZANOTTA（ 沙发） consolle luna（ 条桌） OASISI（ 边柜）.
关于家具的英语单词_百度知道 ... Console 小桌 Console table （装在墙上的）蜗形腿台桌 Contract furniture 订做家具，承建家具.
最新汉英特色词汇词典 - 豆丁网 ... Safe driving 安全行车 Consolation prize 安慰奖 Keypad 手机按键.
进出口行业词汇英语翻译(D) ... display buffer 显示缓冲器 display console 显示控制台 display control switch 显示控制开关.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin consolatio(n-), from the verb consolari (see console)

entry.def: If you console someone who is unhappy about something, you try to make them feel more cheerful.

example.ex: Often they cry, and I have to play the role of a mother, consoling them...
example.tran: 经常他们一哭，我就要充当母亲的角色抚慰他们。

entry.tran: (机器的)操纵台，控制台，仪表板
entry.def: A console is a panel with a number of switches or knobs that is used to operate a machine.

means.word_mean: 1. the comfort you feel when consoled in times of disappointment;

sentences.sentence: "second place was no consolation to him"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of consoling; giving relief in affliction;

sentences.sentence: "his presence was a consolation to her"

auth_sentence.content: Or as consolation for the turn in his career.
auth_sentence.res_content: Or as consolation for the turn in his career.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or as consolation for the turn in his career.

auth_sentence.content: For Mr Dechich's family there is little consolation.
auth_sentence.res_content: For Mr Dechich's family there is little consolation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For Mr Dechich's family there is little consolation.

auth_sentence.content: This box had become his home and consolation.
auth_sentence.res_content: This box had become his home and consolation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This box had become his home and consolation.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"某种物,用品;人等"; 2. 表名词,"动作或状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: accord和谐+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.手风琴
carr=carn肉+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.腐肉
champ+ion人→n.冠军,拥护者,战士
cush垫+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.垫子,软垫
manse住宅+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.大厦,大楼;宅第
product产品+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.生产,产品,作品
scorp原意为一种鱼,后指蝎子+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.蝎子
dismiss解散;开除+ion动作或状态等→n.免职,解雇,不予考虑

stems_affixes.value_cn: 允许进入,承认某事之陈述,供认
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+miss送+ion动作或状态等→送来→许可进入
concise简明的+ion动作或状态等→n.简明,简洁
console安慰+at+ion动作或状态等→n.安慰,慰藉
contradict反驳,矛盾+ion动作或状态等→n.反驳,矛盾
create创造+ion动作或状态等→n.创造,创作物
dilapidate倒塌+ion动作或状态等→n.破旧,荒废

stems_affixes.value_cn: 辨别,区别,识别力,辨别力,歧视
stems_affixes.word_buile: discriminate歧视+ion动作或状态等→n.辨别,区别,识别力,辨别力,歧视
discuss讨论+ion动作或状态等→n.讨论,谈论;论述
edit编辑+ion状态→在以前的基础编辑后→版本,版
expanse膨胀扩张+ion动作或状态等→n.扩张,膨胀;张开,伸展
frict摩擦+ion动作或状态等→n.摩擦,摩擦力
lucubrate用功,深入研究+ion动作或状态等→n.刻苦研究

stems_affixes.value_cn: 航海,航空,导航,领航,航行
stems_affixes.word_buile: navigate航行,航海,导航+ion动作或状态等→n.航海,航空,导航,领航,航行
obligate有责任的+ion动作或状态等→n.义务,责任
obsess迷住,使困扰+ion动作或状态等→n.迷住,困扰
pollute弄脏,污染+ion动作或状态等→污染,玷污

stems_affixes.value_cn: 持有,拥有;所有权;所有物;[
stems_affixes.word_buile: possess占有,拥有+ion动作或状态等→n.持有,拥有;所有权;所有物;[n.]财产,财富
receipt收据,收到+ion动作或状态等→n.接待,招待会,接收
situate使处于+ion动作或状态等→n.情形,境遇

sentences.en: This news was of little consolation to us.
sentences.cn: 这个消息对我们来说没有什么安慰。

sentences.en: When her mother died, she found consolation in her religious beliefs.
sentences.cn: 当她母亲去世时，她在宗教信仰中找到了安慰。

sentences.en: There is some consolation for fans because the team still stands a chance of winning the local championship.
sentences.cn: 使球迷感到有些安慰的是这个队仍然有机会赢得当地比赛冠军。

means.word_mean: 起安慰作用的人(或事物)

sentences.en: The children were a great consolation to me at that time.
sentences.cn: 那时孩子们成了我的莫大安慰。

sentences.en: The next match will probably offer them the consolation of winning.
sentences.cn: 下一场比赛可能给他们带来获胜的安慰。
